text: nishchay hee un logon ne inakaar kiya, jinhonne kaha, "allaah to vahee marayam ka beta maseeh hai." kaho, "allaah ke aage kisaka kuchh bas chal sakata hai, yadi vah marayam ka putr maseeh ko aur usakee maan (marayam) ko aur samast dharateevaalo ko vinasht karana chaahe? aur allaah hee ke lie hai baadashaahee aakaashon aur dharatee kee or jo kuchh unake madhy hai usakee bhee. vah jo chaahata hai paida karata hai. aur allaah ko har cheez kee saamarthy praapt hai.
